answers.answer: Women usually live longer than men.  From the time of diagnosis with medication being taken as prescribed by the doctor and diet being watch carefully I have known family members to live as long as 12 years and that is with left side and right side heart failure. Left side heart failure produces a cough and bloated abdomen.  Right side heart failure produces swelling in the ankles and legs not so much in the feet.  As the heart valves get worse, there will be increasing shortness of breath.  Shortness of breath and chest pain are sign of worsening and she should notify her doctor is she notices worsening of these symptoms.  Blue is a color that is extremely serious.  Blue lips, ears, nose, feet, hands very blue like a crayon means an emergency situation where the left ventricle is shutting down.  Be aware of symptoms that may show signs of CHF getting worse, but try not to worry too much.  People are able to live a long time as long as they take the medication prescribed by their doctor as prescribed.

question: I have read a lot of articles on congestive heart failure.  Many of them say that most people only live five years from the time of diagnosis.  Is that true?  Is it possible that it only goes as far as swelling of the feet for years and never progesses into anything more than it wont be a problem  and you can still live long ,  My mother has this plus diabetes and arrythmia.  When she has taken a blood test the bnp is around 1300 and never gets any higher than this.  What is your opinion of the prognosis for her.
title: chf
